full_summary:
## Bandpass Cavity Filter(s) 108-174 MHz Tender Announcement
### Reference Number: CB-844-71793187
#### Amendment Number: 9
#### Solicitation Number: BPC108-174
#### Publication Date: October 6, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: November 9, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST

**Notice Description:**
Innovation, Science and Economic Development Spectrum and Telecommunications Sector is inviting qualified contractors to submit bids for the supply of Bandpass Cavity Filter(s) 108-174 MHz. The tender is issued against the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC and all terms and conditions of the SA apply.

**Tender Requirements:**

* The contractor must supply the goods in accordance with the requirements stated in the solicitation and annexed documentation.
* Delivery is requested to be completed by no later than February 29, 2024.
* The contractor must provide firm prices in Canadian dollars, DDP (destination), with freight charges included.

**Bid Evaluation:**
Technical compliance to the requirement presented herein and at annexed documentation will be evaluated. Technical compliance of equivalent product(s) offered will also be considered.

**Selection Criteria:**
The lowest priced responsive bid on an aggregate basis will be recommended for award of a contract.

**Resulting Contract:**
The contractor must provide the goods in accordance with the requirements stated in the solicitation and annexed documentation. Delivery is requested to be completed by no later than February 29, 2024.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Samantha Amadio
* Email: [samantha.amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 542-2505

**Attachment:**
The tender notice and annexed documentation are available for download from the Canadabuys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) under the reference number CB-844-71793187.

Please note that the tender is closed and no further submissions will be accepted. [^1]

---

**FA Technical Notes:**
The table below lists the 39 invited SA Holders:

| --- | --- |
| E60HN-16ELEC/001/HN | ANIXTER CANADA INC |
| E60HN-16ELEC/002/HN
